content:
Work done at Google, in collaboration with Alexander Mordvintsev, Eyvind Niklasson, and Michael Levin.
See the Distill article.
description: A Distill article on end-to-end differentiable, self-organising cellular automata.
title: Growing Neural Cellular Automata

content:
My name is Ettore Randazzo, I am a Software Engineer and Researcher at Google Research in ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland. Notable interests of mine are machine intelligence, complex artificial life, philosophy, ethics, logics and mathematics, gaming, music (including playing electric guitar and piano), and writing.
This website is currently barebone, but come back to it in the future as I plan to expand it as I am ready to share more of what I do.
title: About
